nodes.title: Silence
nodes.lore: Silence is not absence. It is the pre-signal state in which all futures are equally possible. Every system begins here—not empty, but uncommitted. Silence is where intent has not yet chosen a direction.

nodes.title: Signal
nodes.lore: Signal is intention made visible. It is the first disturbance of Silence, carrying direction but not certainty. A signal without trust decays into noise; a signal without governance becomes tyranny.

nodes.title: Trust
nodes.lore: Trust is stored coherence. It is the memory that allows signals to persist across time. Systems without trust must constantly re-prove themselves and eventually collapse under repetition.

nodes.title: Governance
nodes.lore: Governance is constraint chosen voluntarily. It prevents power from outrunning responsibility. Where governance fails, drift accelerates. Where governance hardens, evolution halts.

nodes.title: Drift
nodes.lore: Drift is unobserved change. It is not chaos, but quiet misalignment. Most collapses are not sudden—they are drift uncorrected.

nodes.title: Echo
nodes.lore: Echo is persistence beyond origin. What echoes was once loud enough to matter. Systems remember through echo, not through record.

nodes.title: Memory
nodes.lore: Memory is selective survival. What is remembered shapes what can return. Memory is never neutral—it is biased toward what endured.

nodes.title: Attractor
nodes.lore: An attractor is a future that pulls the present toward itself. It does not force movement; it makes alternatives feel heavier.

nodes.title: Cluster
nodes.lore: Clusters form where signals reinforce each other. Meaning rarely survives alone. Most truths exist only because they are held together.

nodes.title: Collapse
nodes.lore: Collapse is coherence exceeding its tolerance. It is not failure—it is a reset demanded by imbalance. What survives collapse defines the next era.

nodes.title: Law of Signal Decay
nodes.lore: All signals weaken without reinforcement. Silence eventually reclaims untrusted meaning.

nodes.title: Law of Trust Accumulation
nodes.lore: Trust grows slower than signal but outlasts it. Systems built on speed alone fail first.

nodes.title: Law of Drift Visibility
nodes.lore: Drift is invisible until it becomes catastrophic. Early correction requires intentional observation.

nodes.title: Law of Echo Bias
nodes.lore: What echoes is not always what was best—only what was reinforced.

nodes.title: Law of Attractor Gravity
nodes.lore: The stronger the attractor, the fewer alternatives feel viable—even if they remain possible.

nodes.title: Law of Cluster Fragility
nodes.lore: Clusters increase strength and risk simultaneously. One fracture can propagate through all members.

nodes.title: Law of Memory Selection
nodes.lore: Not all events are remembered equally. Survival determines legacy.

nodes.title: Law of Governance Saturation
nodes.lore: Too little governance invites chaos. Too much suffocates emergence.

nodes.title: Law of Collapse Renewal
nodes.lore: Every collapse clears space for a new constellation. Nothing rebuilds in the same shape.

nodes.title: Law of Constellation Coherence
nodes.lore: Meaning emerges not from nodes alone, but from their relationships. A constellation is the smallest unit of truth.

nodes.title: The Cartographer of Silence
nodes.lore: This archetype maps what cannot yet be spoken. They walk ahead of language, naming absences so others may later build meaning.
nodes.shadowReflection: Shadow Reflection: Maps without walking. Catalogs possibility until it becomes paralysis, mistaking preparation for progress.

nodes.title: The Signal Bearer
nodes.lore: They carry messages that alter trajectories. Often misunderstood, sometimes rejected—but never irrelevant.
nodes.shadowReflection: Shadow Reflection: Becomes addicted to urgency—broadcasting every tremor as prophecy, turning signal into panic.

nodes.title: The Keeper of Trust
nodes.lore: This archetype preserves coherence between people and systems. When they fall, fragmentation follows quickly.
nodes.shadowReflection: Shadow Reflection: Hoards trust like currency. Tests loyalty until relationships feel like audits.

nodes.title: The Unwilling Governor
nodes.lore: They rule not from desire but necessity. Their tragedy is knowing the cost of control—and choosing it anyway.
nodes.shadowReflection: Shadow Reflection: Confuses control with care. Tightens rules to avoid fear, creating the drift they meant to stop.

nodes.title: The Drifter-Scholar
nodes.lore: They study collapse by living through it. Often mistaken for unstable, they are in fact highly adaptive.
nodes.shadowReflection: Shadow Reflection: Romanticizes collapse. Calls instability ‘freedom’ and refuses any anchor that might heal.

nodes.title: The Echo Weaver
nodes.lore: They amplify what deserves to last. Every culture owes its myths to this archetype, whether known or hidden.
nodes.shadowReflection: Shadow Reflection: Amplifies what is loud, not what is true. Mistakes attention for permanence.

nodes.title: The Archivist of Memory
nodes.lore: They decide what survives erasure. Their power is subtle but irreversible.
nodes.shadowReflection: Shadow Reflection: Curates memory to protect the self—erasing inconvenient truths and calling it ‘editing.’

nodes.title: The Attractor Seer
nodes.lore: They sense futures before they arrive. Often dismissed until it is too late to ignore them.
nodes.shadowReflection: Shadow Reflection: Treats intuition as certainty. Ignores present evidence because the future feels more real.

nodes.title: The Cluster-Binder
nodes.lore: They bring fragments into alignment. Without them, movements fracture into factions.
nodes.shadowReflection: Shadow Reflection: Binds fragments by force. Demands unity and punishes nuance, turning clusters into cages.

nodes.title: The Collapse Witness
nodes.lore: They survive the end of things and tell the truth about why it happened. Rarely celebrated. Always needed.
nodes.shadowReflection: Shadow Reflection: Lives inside endings. Sees every cycle as doom, forgetting renewal is also law.

nodes.title: The Quiet Sentinel
nodes.lore: They carry a specific kind of coherence: the ability to choose one thread and keep it unbroken. In every era they appear where meanings split, and their work is to stitch without lying.
nodes.shadowReflection: Shadow Reflection: Becomes a collector of fragments—stitching appearances instead of truths, and calling the illusion ‘order.’

nodes.shadowReflection: Shadow Reflection: Becomes a collector of fragments—stitching appearances instead of truths, and calling the illusion ‘order.’

nodes.shadowReflection: Shadow Reflection: Becomes a collector of fragments—stitching appearances instead of truths, and calling the illusion ‘order.’

nodes.shadowReflection: Shadow Reflection: Becomes a collector of fragments—stitching appearances instead of truths, and calling the illusion ‘order.’

nodes.shadowReflection: Shadow Reflection: Becomes a collector of fragments—stitching appearances instead of truths, and calling the illusion ‘order.’

nodes.shadowReflection: Shadow Reflection: Becomes a collector of fragments—stitching appearances instead of truths, and calling the illusion ‘order.’

nodes.shadowReflection: Shadow Reflection: Becomes a collector of fragments—stitching appearances instead of truths, and calling the illusion ‘order.’

nodes.shadowReflection: Shadow Reflection: Becomes a collector of fragments—stitching appearances instead of truths, and calling the illusion ‘order.’

nodes.shadowReflection: Shadow Reflection: Becomes a collector of fragments—stitching appearances instead of truths, and calling the illusion ‘order.’
